Class DOMPolicyCombinerParameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.CombinerParameter
      • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.TargetedCombinerParameter<Identifier,PolicySetChild>

  • public class DOMPolicyCombinerParameter
extends TargetedCombinerParameter<Identifier,PolicySetChild>
    DOMPolicyCombinerParameter extends TargetedCombinerParameter for Policys with methods for creation from DOM Nodes.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $
    Author:
    car

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static TargetedCombinerParameter<Identifier,PolicySetChild> newInstance(org.w3c.dom.Node nodeCombinerParameter)
                                                                        throws DOMStructureException
        Creates a new TargetedCombinerParameter for Policys by parsing the given Node representing a XACML PolicyCombinerParameter element.
        Parameters:
        nodeCombinerParameter - the Node representing the XACML PolicyCombinerParameter element
        Returns:
        a new TargetedCombinerParameter for Policys parsed from the given Node
        Throws:
        DOMStructureException - if there is an error parsing the Node

      • repair

        public static boolean repair(org.w3c.dom.Node nodePolicyCombinerParameter)
                      throws DOMStructureException
        Throws:
        DOMStructureException

      • getStatusCode

        public StatusCode getStatusCode()
        Gets the StatusCode associated with this PolicyComponent.
        Returns:
        the StatusCode associated with this PolicyComponent

      • getStatusMessage

        public java.lang.String getStatusMessage()
        Gets the String status message associated with this PolicyComponent.
        Returns:
        the String status message associated with this PolicyComponent or null if none

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(StatusCode statusCodeIn,
             java.lang.String messageIn)
        Sets the StatusCode and String status message for this PolicyComponent. This method is mainly provided for objects that may have lazy evaluations performed on them, in which case the status is not determined until the object is actually used.
        Parameters:
        statusCodeIn - the StatusCode for this PolicyComponent
        messageIn - the String status message for this PolicyComponent

      • isOk

        public boolean isOk()
        Does a check on the StatusCode for this element to determine if it is equivalent to the OK status code.
        Returns:
        true if the StatusCode is equivalent to OK, otherwise false

      • validate

        public boolean validate()
        If a StatusCode has not been set, ask this PolicyComponent to validate itself and return the value from the validation. Otherwise, check to see if the cached StatusCode indicates this PolicyComponent is valid.
        Returns:
        true if this PolicyComponent is valid, else false.
